Sairash Sharma Gautam ​

सइरश शर्मा गौतम ​

नमस्ते - Namaste

Sairash in PersonSairash while Online

Note: Throughout the website, I am going to be replaced by this mascot.

मेरो बारेमा (About me) ​

म साइरश शर्मा गौतम, एक उत्साही सफ्टवेयर विकासकर्ता, हाल नेपालमा कम्प्युटर साइन्समा स्नातक गर्दै छु।

नयाँ कुरा सिक्ने रुचि र चुनौतीहरू सामना गर्ने जोशका साथ मैले यो क्षेत्रमा करिब +३ वर्ष अघि प्रवेश गरेँ।

म विभिन्न कम्पनीहरूसँग सहकार्य गर्दै तिनीहरूको अवधारणा र दृष्टिकोणलाई वास्तविकतामा रूपान्तरण गर्ने कार्य गर्छु।



English Version ​

I'm Sairash Sharma Gautam, a software enthusiast, currently pursuing higher studies from Nepal. I enjoy learning new things and try to overcome new challenges while analyzing how I improved through them.

I've spent the past +3 years collaborating and building products with companies and freelance gigs.

I join forces with founders and companies to help mold their ideas and vision to reality. Ones that make their products shine, resonate with users, and help people create memories.
